<title level="1" right="Action">[Clue In](/Actions.aspx?ID=545) <actions string="Reaction" /></title>

<traits>
<trait label="Concentrate" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=32" />
<trait label="Investigator" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=318" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Advanced Player's Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=39) pg. 56 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

**Frequency** once per 10 minutes

**Trigger** Another creature attempts a check to investigate a lead you're pursuing.

</column>

---

You share information with the triggering creature. They gain a circumstance bonus to their check equal to your circumstance bonus to checks investigating your subject from Pursue a Lead. The GM can add any relevant traits to this reaction depending on the situation, such as [auditory](/Traits.aspx?ID=16) and [linguistic](/Traits.aspx?ID=101) if you're conveying information verbally.
name: Clue In
